ygData.subject: Re: Strategies and quests (part 2)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... the SK quests, but they are sorted by zone, and it is much more interesting ...  AllaKhazam s Magical Realm http://everquest.gamestats.com/
ygData.messageBody:
<snip>
>I've tried looking at the various Web pages for info on
the SK quests, but they are sorted by zone, and it is
much more interesting
>to me to see quests by class/race.
>
>I'm also interested in finding faction breakdowns, etc.
<snip>

AllaKhazam's Magical Realm
http://everquest.gamestats.com/

This site has links to a Faction Chart that is sortable
many ways:
List of Faction Groups
Faction Adjustments by Monster
Faction Adjustments by Group
Faction Adjustments by Quest

There are also Quest links that are the most complete I
have ever seen. These are listed by Zone but are also
viewable by Item. So if you know what you want, scan
the list.

--
Cronik <Brethren of ill Omen>
Left Hand of Thule the Pain Bringer
14th Season Troll SK
Bertoxxulous

"Greenbloods jus be Froglok trick. Smash'm and dey
blood same color a Froglok. Me smash'm Greenblood
for Thule. Thule make Cronik big feared. Make
smash'm fun."
